This package allows to draw interactive charts from the *JavaScript* library [AmCharts][url_amcharts] using [Hmlwidgets][url_htmlwidgets].
Since it is still in developpment, some functionnalities might have an unexpected behavior. If you encounter the problem, do not hesitate to contact.

It requires the followings packages:
  
  - Main architecture to load js dependencies
```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("htmlwidgets")){
  install.packages('htmlwidgets')
}else{}
```

- Use R functions with pipe for constructing chart
```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("pipeR")){
  install.packages("pipeR")
}else{}
```

- Used in package to manage list
```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("rlist")){
  install.packages("rlist")
}else{}
```

- For the moment, only used in the developpment function...
```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("data.table")){
  install.packages("data.table")
}else{}
```

- Use in shiny app:
  ```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("shiny")){
  install.packages("shiny")  
}else{}
```

Those packages are indicated in the ***DESCRIPTION*** file with the *Depends* tag. Consequently, they are essential.

---
  
  # Installation
  
  Once the above dependent packages available, you can run the following code lines to install ***rAmChart***:
  
  ```{r, eval = FALSE}
if ( require(devtools) ) {
  install.packages(devtools)
} else{}
devtools::install_github("Djaiff/rAmCharts")
```

---
  
  [url_amcharts]: http://www.amcharts.com
[url_htmlwidgets]: http://www.htmlwidgets.org
